description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Rack up the millions with meteors, rockets, orbits, black holes and airlocks as you go in search of the jackpot in this fast-paced, space-themed pinball game. Timing is everything as you use the flippers (and the occasional "tilt") to guide the ball towards the cosmic prizes on offer. With tons of features and secrets, Planet Pinball is light years better than any pinball game you've ever played!
